title: Lily Allen goes make-up free in NYC after promising not to return to UK before Brexit
text:

Lily Allen continued her stay in New York City as she waits for Brexit before returning to the UK.

The Smile hitmaker, 34, stayed true to her word as she resided in the Big Apple with her new love David Harbour, 44.

Make-up free Lily showed off her glowing complexion, offset by scraping her raven locks off her face with a patterned headband.

The songstress wrapped up for the winter season in a thick black coat which she paired with her grey leggings.

It looks like Lily will have to stay in New York City for longer as Boris Johnson extended the deadline until 31 January 2020.

(Image: BACKGRID)

She initially told her fans: "Leaving UK till after Brexit. Good Luck Kids.

"Also what's the most annoying engagement baiting question caption you've read? LMK in the comments."

Yet things have been heating up in the romance department for Lily.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

She has made things Insta-official with her new boyfriend, Stranger Things actor David Harbour.

The couple were spotted packing on the PDA during a stroll in New York City recently as they walked hand in hand through Manhatten.

The pair have been spotted on dates together a number of times, including at the Hughie Fury and Alexander Povetkin boxing match in London.

They were also seen leaving a London theatre together earlier this year.

Lily has two daughters from her marriage to Sam Cooper, and she split from her boyfriend of three years, grime MC Medirian Dan, last year.
description: Lily has been enjoying life in New York City with her new man David Harbour before anticipating return to UK after Brexit
